coreAtributes.authorTag: Faintly raised lettering on each pad reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's tactical elbow pads
coreAtributes.description: A pair of hard plastic plates riveted to elbow pads made from shock absorbing foam. They attach to the wearer's elbows via adjustable straps

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the tactical elbow pads over [npc.her] elbows and [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the tactical elbow pads over [npc2.namePos] elbows and [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stuff)] [npc2.namePos] legs through the tactical elbow pads and hastily [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the straps on [npc.her] tactical elbow pads and [npc.verb(slip)] them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the straps on [npc2.namePos] tactical elbow pads and [npc.verb(slip)] them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] at the straps on [npc2.namePos] tactical elbow pads until they're loose enough and [npc.verb(toss)] them aside.
